column1: #Text=General says : " Tonraq and the rebels are holed up here in the hills outside of town . "
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I need you two to go after the Avatar .
#Text=She 's the only one who can open the Northern spirit portal .
#Text=" Desna says : " But Father , you told Korra - " Unalaq says : " I told Korra what I thought she needed to hear .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I need her alive .
